reviewText: can't go wrong with word world. too cute.
The dvd came quickly. The grandchildren love it.

This DVD contains 4 episodes from the WordWorld cartoon. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:

1. Back on Track
2. Ride 'em CowBear
3. M is for Map
4. Nightlight

Bonus Features:
1. "It's Time to Rhyme" Music Video
2. Build-A-Word Songs

sparked an interest in reading and spelling in my 3 year old. She now recognizes written language as a form of communication and loves it. We sing the songs together and I got foamy bath letters so we can build our own words like in the movie.
My youngest granddaughter wanted this and it was so easy to order at a good price and just wait for it to arrive.

I have a 3 year old and she and I both love this series. They are educational and keep her entertained. Keep them coming. The only downfall I have to these is that i wish the running times were longer than they are...
